id.description: Unique identifier for the user profile, same as the user's UID.

isRosterMember.description: Whether the user is an official member of the team roster.

Vote.title: Vote
Vote.description: Represents a user's vote for a specific time slot.

id.description: Unique identifier for the vote, composite of userId and timeslot.

timeslot.description: The time slot that the vote is for (e.g., '2024-07-20_4:30 PM').

voteValue.description: Indicates whether the user is available (true).

ScheduledEvent.title: ScheduledEvent
ScheduledEvent.description: Represents a scheduled training session or tournament.

creatorId.description: The UID of the user who created the event.

date.description: The date of the event in 'yyyy-MM-dd' format.

time.description: The time of the event (e.g., '6:30 PM').

isRecurring.description: Indicates if the event is part of a weekly recurring series.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profile data. The document ID is the user's UID.

/votes/{voteId}.description: Stores individual user votes for time slots. Document ID is a composite key for easy upserts.

/scheduledEvents/{eventId}.description: Stores information about scheduled events. Rules allow any authenticated user to read, but only the creator to write or delete.
